skdetail:

Invocation Name: bedtime story
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bedtime Story is the Alexa skill designed to bring a magical bedtime experience. It offers soothing stories that help you relax, unwind, and drift effortlessly into peaceful sleep. With a collection of over 10 unique tales narrated by calming voices, accompanied by tranquil background sounds, Bedtime Story is your perfect companion for creating a comforting and enjoyable bedtime routine.

⭐ PREMIUM FEATURES ⭐

• Engaging and relaxing bedtime stories narrated by professional, soothing voices
• A variety of ambient background sounds to enhance your relaxation
• Unlimited access to the complete story library without any restrictions
• Fresh and regularly updated content to keep bedtime exciting
• Full access to stories of all durations to suit your schedule

Your feedback helps us ensure Bedtime Story continues to deliver the ultimate storytelling experience.

💫 Let the magic of bedtime stories guide you to serene and restful nights! 💫
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
